---
title: "Submit a Package"
---

## Submit Your R Package

Help grow The Warehouse by submitting your package! We accept packages from:

- ✅ CRAN (auto-indexed, but you can add details)
- ✅ GitHub
- ✅ Bioconductor
- ✅ GitLab, Bitbucket, or private repos

---

<form id="submission-form" class="submission-form">

### Package Information

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="package-name">Package Name *</label>
  <input type="text" id="package-name" name="package-name" required
         placeholder="e.g., EpiEstim">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="package-url">Package URL *</label>
  <input type="url" id="package-url" name="package-url" required
         placeholder="https://github.com/username/package">
  <small>GitHub, CRAN, or other repository URL</small>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="title">Short Description *</label>
  <input type="text" id="title" name="title" required
         placeholder="One-line description of what your package does">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="description">Detailed Description</label>
  <textarea id="description" name="description" rows="4"
            placeholder="What problem does your package solve? What makes it unique?"></textarea>
</div>

### Categorization

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="category">Primary Category *</label>
  <select id="category" name="category" required>
    <option value="">Select a category...</option>
    <option value="epidemiology">Epidemiology</option>
    <option value="data-manipulation">Data Manipulation</option>
    <option value="visualization">Visualization</option>
    <option value="statistical-modeling">Statistical Modeling</option>
    <option value="machine-learning">Machine Learning</option>
    <option value="time-series">Time Series</option>
    <option value="spatial">Spatial Analysis</option>
    <option value="other">Other</option>
  </select>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="keywords">Keywords (comma-separated)</label>
  <input type="text" id="keywords" name="keywords"
         placeholder="e.g., outbreak, R0, serial interval, epidemic">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="use-cases">Common Use Cases</label>
  <textarea id="use-cases" name="use-cases" rows="3"
            placeholder="What specific tasks is your package good for? e.g., 'Estimate serial interval from case data'"></textarea>
</div>

### Documentation

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="readme-url">README URL</label>
  <input type="url" id="readme-url" name="readme-url"
         placeholder="Direct link to README">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="docs-url">Documentation Website</label>
  <input type="url" id="docs-url" name="docs-url"
         placeholder="pkgdown site or other documentation">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="vignettes">Vignettes</label>
  <input type="text" id="vignettes" name="vignettes"
         placeholder="List vignette titles or URLs">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="paper-doi">Related Paper (DOI)</label>
  <input type="text" id="paper-doi" name="paper-doi"
         placeholder="10.xxxx/xxxxx">
</div>

### Installation

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="install-command">Installation Command *</label>
  <textarea id="install-command" name="install-command" rows="2" required
            placeholder="install.packages('packagename')">install.packages("packagename")</textarea>
</div>

### Quality Indicators

<div class="form-group">
  <label>Does your package have:</label>
  <label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" name="has-tests" value="yes"> Automated tests
  </label>
  <label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" name="has-ci" value="yes"> Continuous Integration (GitHub Actions, Travis, etc.)
  </label>
  <label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" name="has-vignettes" value="yes"> Vignettes or tutorials
  </label>
  <label class="checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" name="has-pkgdown" value="yes"> pkgdown documentation site
  </label>
</div>

### Contact Information

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="submitter-name">Your Name *</label>
  <input type="text" id="submitter-name" name="submitter-name" required
         placeholder="John Doe">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="submitter-email">Your Email *</label>
  <input type="email" id="submitter-email" name="submitter-email" required
         placeholder="you@example.com">
  <small>We'll contact you if we have questions. Not displayed publicly.</small>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="relationship">Relationship to Package *</label>
  <select id="relationship" name="relationship" required>
    <option value="">Select...</option>
    <option value="author">Package author/maintainer</option>
    <option value="contributor">Contributor</option>
    <option value="user">User/advocate</option>
    <option value="other">Other</option>
  </select>
</div>

### Additional Context

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="similar-packages">Similar Packages</label>
  <input type="text" id="similar-packages" name="similar-packages"
         placeholder="List related packages (helps with categorization)">
</div>

<div class="form-group">
  <label for="unique-features">What Makes This Package Unique?</label>
  <textarea id="unique-features" name="unique-features" rows="3"
            placeholder="How does this package differ from alternatives?"></textarea>
</div>

---

<div class="form-group">
  <button type="submit" class="submit-button">Submit Package</button>
</div>

<div id="form-status" class="form-status"></div>

</form>
